mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cart_no, user_no, product_no, amount, delivery, size, color) VALUES (#{cart_no}, #{user_no}, #{product_no}, #{amount}, #{delivery}, #{size}, #{color});
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE cart_no = #{cart_no} AND user_no = #{user_no};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_order (order_no, user_no, rec, postcode, address, address_detail, order_total) VALUES (#{order_no}, #{user_no}, #{rec}, #{postcode}, #{address}, #{address_detail}, #{order_total});

INSERT INTO tbl_order_detail (order_detail_no, order_no, product_no, amount, delivery, size, color) SELECT #{order_detail_no}, #{order_no}, #{product_no}, amount, delivery, size, color FROM cart c WHERE #{product_no} = c.product_no;
